name: jms/di-extra-bundle
description: Allows to configure dependency injection using annotations

name: jms/security-extra-bundle
description: Enhances the Symfony2 Security Component by adding several new features

name: twig/twig
description: Twig, the flexible, fast, and secure template language for PHP

name: doctrine/lexer
description: Base library for a lexer that can be used in Top-Down, Recursive Descent Parsers.

name: doctrine/inflector
description: Common String Manipulations with regard to casing and singular/plural rules.

name: doctrine/cache
description: Caching library offering an object-oriented API for many cache backends

suggest.symfony/yaml: If you want to use YAML Metadata Mapping Driver

suggest.leafo/lessphp: Assetic provides the integration with the lessphp LESS compiler
suggest.leafo/scssphp: Assetic provides the integration with the scssphp SCSS compiler
suggest.leafo/scssphp-compass: Assetic provides the integration with the SCSS compass plugin
suggest.ptachoire/cssembed: Assetic provides the integration with phpcssembed to embed data uris
suggest.twig/twig: Assetic provides the integration with the Twig templating engine

name: jms/parser-lib
description: A library for easily creating recursive-descent parsers.

name: twig/extensions
description: Common additional features for Twig that do not directly belong in core

name: sensio/generator-bundle
description: This bundle generates code for you

name: monolog/monolog

suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Allow sending log messages to AWS services like DynamoDB
suggest.doctrine/couchdb: Allow sending log messages to a CouchDB server
suggest.ext-amqp: Allow sending log messages to an AMQP server (1.0+ required)
suggest.ext-mongo: Allow sending log messages to a MongoDB server
suggest.mlehner/gelf-php: Allow sending log messages to a GrayLog2 server
suggest.raven/raven: Allow sending log messages to a Sentry server
suggest.ruflin/elastica: Allow sending log messages to an Elastic Search server

description: Sends your logs to files, sockets, inboxes, databases and various web services

name: sensio/framework-extra-bundle
description: This bundle provides a way to configure your controllers with annotations

name: sensio/distribution-bundle
description: The base bundle for the Symfony Distributions

suggest.doctrine/orm: The Doctrine ORM integration is optional in the bundle.

suggest.willdurand/propel-typehintable-behavior: Needed when using the propel implementation

name: willdurand/negotiation
description: Content Negotiation tools for PHP provided as a standalone library.

name: friendsofsymfony/rest-bundle

suggest.jms/serializer-bundle: Add support for advanced serialization capabilities, recommended, requires 0.12.*
suggest.sensio/framework-extra-bundle: Add support for route annotations and the view response listener
suggest.symfony/serializer: Add support for basic serialization capabilities and xml decoding, requires ~2.2

description: This Bundle provides various tools to rapidly develop RESTful API's with Symfony2

name: jms/serializer

suggest.symfony/yaml: Required if you'd like to serialize data to YAML format.

description: Library for (de-)serializing data of any complexity; supports XML, JSON, and YAML.

name: jms/serializer-bundle

suggest.jms/di-extra-bundle: Required to get lazy loading (de)serialization visitors, ~1.3

description: Allows you to easily serialize, and deserialize data of any complexity
